# Draft:Flowbox (software)

----
}}
Flowbox is a Swedish technology company that provides software for brands and retailers to collect and display user-generated content (UGC) such as customer photos and videos on their e-commerce websites. Founded in 2016, the company has operations in Stockholm, Barcelona, Amsterdam and Copenhagen.
History
Flowbox was founded by Marcus Carloni 2016.
In June 2022, Flowbox merged with Photoslurp, a Barcelona-based UGC platform used primarily by fashion and lifestyle brands. Following the merge Eulogi Bordas became the new CEO of Flowbox.
In September 2025, Flowbox acquired the Danish influencer-marketing platform Dreaminfluence.Following the deal, Flowbox employs around 70 people company-wide,
